messages.message: Method \Tests\Sniffs\SlevomatCodingStandard\TypeHints\ReturnTypeHint\BadExample::getName() does not have native return type hint for its return value but it should be possible to add it based on @return annotation "string".

Method \Tests\Sniffs\SlevomatCodingStandard\TypeHints\ReturnTypeHint\BadExample::getAge() does not have native return type hint for its return value but it should be possible to add it based on @return annotation "int".
